headline: Americans to bet up to $3.1B on March Madness. BetMGM CEO weighs in.
summary: Americans are expected to wager up to $3.1 billion during NCAA's March Madness tournament, up from $2.7 billion in 2024, according to estimates from the American Gaming Association (AGA).. BetMGM CEO Adam Greenblatt joins Asking for a Trend with Josh Lipton to discuss the sports betting landscape ahead of the men's and women's NCAA tournaments kicking off later this month. MGM Resorts International (MGM) is the parent company of BetMGM. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Asking for a Trend here.
